containerOverrides.name: backend
command:
import asyncio
import asyncpg
from datetime import datetime

async def verify_admin():
    conn = await asyncpg.connect(
        host='cheasydiy-production-db.c9sieeomsxup.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com',
        port=5432,
        user='dbadmin',
        password='ChEasyDiy2024!',
        database='cheasydiy'
    )
    
    # Check if admin user exists
    admin = await conn.fetchrow('SELECT id, username, email, user_type FROM users WHERE email = $1', 'admin@cheasydiy.com')
    
    if admin:
        print(f'✓ Admin user exists: {admin}')
    else:
        print('❌ Admin user not found')
        
    # List all users
    users = await conn.fetch('SELECT id, username, email, user_type FROM users LIMIT 5')
    print(f'All users: {users}')
    
    await conn.close()

asyncio.run(verify_admin())
